channel.title: Today's Prayer Site
channel.description: Recent content on Today's Prayer Site

item.title: Today's Prayer
item.description: November 23, 2022 Today's Verse Hebrews 4:15 [15] For we do not have a high priest who is unable to sympathize with our weaknesses, but one who in every respect has been tempted as we are, yet without sin. Today's Memory Verse Romans 12: 1-2 - I appeal to you therefore, brothers, by the mercies of God, to present your bodies as a living sacrifice, holy and acceptable to God, which is your spiritual worship.
